definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

sentences.english: The main accumulation stages are late Hercynian and Himalayan.
sentences.chinese: 其主成藏期爲海西晚期和喜馬拉雅晚期。

sentences.english: There is no consistency in the data on the area glaciers cover in the Himalayas.
sentences.chinese: 在喜馬拉雅地區冰川覆蓋的地方缺乏一致的數據。
“喜馬拉雅”在藏語中是“冰雪之鄉”的意思。

sentences.english: Thirty of the world's highest mountains are in the Himalaya range.
sentences.chinese: 三十個的世界上最高的山都是在喜馬拉雅範圍。

sentences.english: Smoke-shrouded lowlands hug the southern margin of the Himalaya.
sentences.chinese: 煙霧籠罩的低地緊靠着喜馬拉雅的南緣。

sentences.english: This is the first time that such a survey is being conducted in the Himalayas.
sentences.chinese: 這將是首次在喜馬拉雅地區進行這樣的一場調查。

sentences.english: The displacement tookplace in the period of Indo-China movement and the emplacement in Himalayan period.
sentences.chinese: 位移時期在印支期，侵位和暴露於喜馬拉雅期。

sentences.english: North India lives off Himalayan snows as well.
sentences.chinese: 印度北部也靠喜馬拉雅的雪來滋潤。

sentences.english: These are all traces of the ancient Himalayan Sea.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是喜馬拉雅古海的蹤跡。

sentences.english: It is caused by Himalayan geotectonics coupled with the monsoon regime.
sentences.chinese: 它是由喜馬拉雅的地質構造和季風體系聯合造成的。

sentences.english: Once upon a time there was a cruel monkey king who ruled in the Himalayas.
sentences.chinese: 從前有一隻殘忍的猴王，它在喜馬拉雅羣山上稱王。

sentences.english: The yogis meditate on Thee as Uma, great Himalaya's daughter.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽士把你作爲偉大的喜馬拉雅的女兒烏瑪來冥想。

sentences.english: Smoke-shrouded lowlands hug the southern margin of the Himalayas.
sentences.chinese: 煙霧籠罩的低地緊靠着喜馬拉雅的南緣。

definition: Cristóbal Colón or Christopher Columbus (1451-1506)/Columbus, capital of Ohio
Mt Gang Rinpoche in Tibet/also called Mount Kailash
Goddess peak (Nepalese: Sagarmatha, Sky Goddess)/refers to Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan), Chinese 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰/Mt Everest
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
Hongshan district of Chifeng city 赤峰市, Inner Mongolia
